result.eng: Would you like a bite to eat?
result.html: ar mhaith leat greim biaWould you like a bite to eat?
result.ponchtml: ar ṁaiṫ leat greim biaWould you like a bite to eat?

result.html: bhain an madra greim asamThe dog bit me.
result.ponchtml: ḃain an madra greim asamThe dog bit me.

result.eng: He grabbed the microphone and started singing.
result.ga: fuair sé greim ar an mhicreafón agus thosaigh ag canadh
result.orig: Fuair sé greim ar an mhicreafón agus thosaigh ag canadh
result.html: fuair sé greim ar an mhicreafón agus thosaigh ag canadhHe grabbed the microphone and started singing.
result.ponchtml: fuair sé greim ar an ṁicreafón agus ṫosaiġ ag canaḋHe grabbed the microphone and started singing.

result.eng: We haven't managed to get a hold of the Chinese market yet.
result.ga: níor éirigh linn greim a fháil ar mhargadh na síne go fóill
result.orig: Níor éirigh linn greim a fháil ar mhargadh na Síne go fóill
result.html: níor éirigh linn greim a fháil ar mhargadh na síne go fóillWe haven't managed to get a hold of the Chinese market yet.
result.ponchtml: níor éiriġ linn greim a ḟáil ar ṁargaḋ na síne go fóillWe haven't managed to get a hold of the Chinese market yet.

result.eng: Hold them tight so they don't get away.
result.ga: coinnigh greim orthu ar eagla go n-imeoidís
result.orig: Coinnigh greim orthu ar eagla go n-imeoidís
result.html: coinnigh greim orthu ar eagla go n-imeoidísHold them tight so they don't get away.
result.ponchtml: coinniġ greim orṫu ar eagla go n-imeoidísHold them tight so they don't get away.

result.eng: His mother led him by the hand to school.
result.ga: chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoile
result.orig: Chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoile
result.html: chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoileHis mother led him by the hand to school.
result.ponchtml: ċuaiġ sé lena ṁáṫair ar ġreim láiṁe go teaċ na scoileHis mother led him by the hand to school.

result.eng: He looked at the kid she was leading by the hand.
result.ga: d'amharc sé ar an tachrán ar ghreim láimhe léi
result.orig: D'amharc sé ar an tachrán ar ghreim láimhe léi
result.html: d'amharc sé ar an tachrán ar ghreim láimhe léiHe looked at the kid she was leading by the hand.
result.ponchtml: d'aṁarc sé ar an taċrán ar ġreim láiṁe léiHe looked at the kid she was leading by the hand.

result.eng: He grabbed her by her hair.
result.html: fuair sé greim gruaige uirthiHe grabbed her by her hair.
result.ponchtml: fuair sé greim gruaige uirṫiHe grabbed her by her hair.

result.eng: They haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ga: ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.orig: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.html: ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ponchtml: ní ḃfuair siad aon ġreim le níl a ḟios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.

result.eng: He grabbed him by the shoulder.
result.ga: rug sé greim gualann air
result.html: rug sé greim gualann airHe grabbed him by the shoulder.
result.ponchtml: rug sé greim gualann airHe grabbed him by the shoulder.

result.eng: Make sure to grab them by the throat and strangle them.
result.ga: bí siúráilte greim sceadamáin a bhreith orthu agus a dtachtadh
result.orig: Bí siúráilte greim sceadamáin a bhreith orthu agus a dtachtadh
result.html: bí siúráilte greim sceadamáin a bhreith orthu agus a dtachtadhMake sure to grab them by the throat and strangle them.
result.ponchtml: bí siúráilte greim sceadamáin a ḃreiṫ orṫu agus a dtaċtaḋMake sure to grab them by the throat and strangle them.

result.eng: You will know you shouldn't grab a hen by its wing.
result.ga: beidh a fhios agat gan greim eiteoga a fháil ar chirc
result.orig: Beidh a fhios agat gan greim eiteoga a fháil ar chirc
result.html: beidh a fhios agat gan greim eiteoga a fháil ar chircYou will know you shouldn't grab a hen by its wing.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ a ḟios agat gan greim eiteoga a ḟáil ar ċircYou will know you shouldn't grab a hen by its wing.
